attacks.name: Tandem Shock
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokémon this turn, this attack does 80 more damage, and your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Lightning Ride GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {L} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 more damage. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
